title: Weeding Made Easy - Year Round Mulch Garden

tasks.task: Weeding in a year-round mulch garden
subtasks: Identify weeds growing in the garden
Locate hay in another part of the garden
Transfer hay from one area to the weed
Apply hay mulch directly on the weeds
Ensure the mulch smothers the weeds quickly

tasks.task: Weeding in a year-round mulch garden
